biotools.summary: Subcellular spatial transcriptomics cell segmentation (SCS), which combines imaging data with sequencing data to improve cell segmentation accuracy. SCS assigns spots to cells by adaptively learning the position of each spot relative to the center of its cell using a transformer neural network.

bioschemas.name: SCS
